# makeNowPlayingInfoLanguageOptionGroup()

**Instance Method**

Creates a language option group from the media selection group.

## Declaration

```swift
func makeNowPlayingInfoLanguageOptionGroup() -> MPNowPlayingInfoLanguageOptionGroup
```

## Return Value

The new language option group.

## Discussion

Any option from [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVMediaSelectionOption] in the [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVMediaSelectionGroup] not representing an audible or legible selection option is ignored.
